meanings.definition: A person who is well-known in fashionable society and is fond of social activities.
meanings.sent1: The socialites attended the glamorous gala in their elegant attire.
meanings.sent2: The socialites were the center of attention at the high-class event.
meanings.sent3: The socialites giggled and chatted merrily at the posh gathering.
meanings.sent4: The socialites were like shining stars in the sophisticated social scene.
meanings.sent5: The socialites' presence added a touch of elegance to the soirée.

meanings.definition: A group of socialites gathered at the exclusive party.
meanings.sent1: At the luxurious mansion, the socialites mingled and laughed together.
meanings.sent2: The exclusive party was filled with socialites from all over the city.
meanings.sent3: The socialites shared stories and jokes, creating a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The group of socialites sparkled like jewels in the opulent setting.
meanings.sent5: The gathering of socialites exuded an air of sophistication and charm.

meanings.definition: She socialized with the socialites at the charity event.
meanings.sent1: Among the elite crowd, she felt at ease chatting with the socialites.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the company of the socialites who supported the cause.
meanings.sent3: Her conversations with the socialites were filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: In the midst of the socialites, she felt like a part of an exclusive club.
meanings.sent5: Interacting with the socialites added a touch of glamour to her evening.
